title: Honey glazed chicken, bacon & potato salad

ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose British Chicken Breast Fillets, sliced
1 x half a 200g pack essential Waitrose Smoked British Bacon Lardons
400g essential Waitrose New Potatoes, cut into bitesize chunks

instructions.step: Heat the oil and fry the chicken and lardons for 8-10 minutes until golden and cooked throughout (with no pink meat on the chicken).
Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in boiling water for 10 minutes until tender, then drain.
Add the honey and vinegar to the chicken.Add the potatoes, toss into the salad and serve.
